## Summary

.pull-left[

Launched in 2017 by the European Space Agency

Orbits at altitude of 824km

Measuring pollutants in Earth's atmosphere, including:
- Ozone (O3)
- Nitrogen Dioxide (NO2)
- Sulfur Dioxide (SO2)
- Methane (CH4)
- Carbon Monoxide (CO)
